text: @josemorgado I’m baffled as to how @DjokerNole ever thought that this was a good idea. The footage of the dancing the basketball & the player photographs suggests an arrogance & lack of thought in the extreme where #COVID19 is concerned. For whatever misguided reason he risked others health
